content.title: Type A Dissection Presentation
content.definition: Severe tearing chest pain radiating to back, pulse deficits, aortic regurgitation, tamponade, or stroke.
content.statement: Type A Dissection Presentation is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
